DataElement.preferredName: Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite Sexual Medications/Devices Supplement Tried or Currently Use Penile Injection Therapy to Improve Erection Score 5 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of whether or not they have tried penile injection therapy or currently use it to improve erections, using a five point Likert Scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite Sexual Medications/Devices Supplement Medicine or Device Tried or Currently Used to Improve Erection Penile Injection Therapy Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A component of the EPIC designed to assess the use of erectile aids among patients treated for prostate cancer._A question about which medicine or device an individual uses or has used to improve an erection._Self-administered injections of vasodilators into the corpus cavernosa to promote engorgement and tumescence of the glans with sexual stimulation._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite, Sexual Medications/Devices Supplement
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A component of the EPIC designed to assess the use of erectile aids among patients treated for prostate cancer.

Concepts.longName: Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite, Sexual Medications/Devices Supplement
Concepts.definition: A component of the EPIC designed to assess the use of erectile aids among patients treated for prostate cancer.

Property.preferredName: Medicine or Device Tried or Currently Used to Improve Erection Penile Injection Therapy Score
Property.preferredDefinition: A question about which medicine or device an individual uses or has used to improve an erection.:Self-administered injections of vasodilators into the corpus cavernosa to promote engorgement and tumescence of the glans with sexual stimulation.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.longName: Medicine or Device Tried or Currently Used to Improve Erection
Concepts.definition: A question about which medicine or device an individual uses or has used to improve an erection.
Self-administered injections of vasodilators into the corpus cavernosa to promote engorgement and tumescence of the glans with sexual stimulation.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for RTOG 1218 per request by E.Motyka. mc 8/15/13

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The act of contributing to the fulfillment of a need or furtherance of an effort._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability._A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::5_The precise location of something; a spatially limited location._an ordered reference standard.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: It HELPED, and I use it ALWAYS

ValueMeaning.preferredName: It HELPED, and I use it ALWAYS
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response that something has helped an individual and it is being used always.

Concepts.definition: A response that something has helped an individual and it is being used always.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: It HELPED, and I use it SOMETIMES

ValueMeaning.preferredName: It HELPED, and I use it SOMETIMES
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response that something has helped an individual and it is being used sometimes.

Concepts.definition: A response that something has helped an individual and it is being used sometimes.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: It HELPED, but I am NOT using it NOW

ValueMeaning.preferredName: It HELPED, but I am NOT using it NOW
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response that something has helped an individual but it is not being used now.

Concepts.longName: Helped but Not Using It Now
Concepts.definition: A response that something has helped an individual but it is not being used now.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Tried it, but was NOT HELPFUL

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Tried it, but was NOT HELPFUL
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response that something has been tried by an individual but it has not been found to be helpful.

Concepts.definition: A response that something has been tried by an individual but it has not been found to be helpful.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response that something has not been tried by an individual.

Concepts.definition: A response that something has not been tried by an individual.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The act of contributing to the fulfillment of a need or furtherance of an effort.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.:A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::5:The precise location of something; a spatially limited location.:an ordered reference standard.

Concepts.definition: The act of contributing to the fulfillment of a need or furtherance of an effort.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
The precise location of something; a spatially limited location.
An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.
